example.title: Code listing: the original array converted to a nested array
example.programlisting:
<?php
array ( 'admin' => array ( 0 => array( 'id' => 1, 'name' => 'Pieter', 'group' => 'admin' ), 1 => array( 'id' => 2, 'name' => 'Fiona', 'group' => 'admin' ), ), 'user' => array ( 0 => array( 'id' => 3, 'name' => 'Bert', 'group' => 'user' ), ), 'guest' => array ( 0 => array( 'id' => 3, 'name' => 'Jan', 'group' => 'guest' ), ), )
?>
